description:
<p>Set up in 1996 as the Preferred Provider of GP Out of Hours Services, BARDOC has evolved into a leader of delivering a diverse range of 24/7 healthcare services across the North East Sector of Greater Manchester.</p>
<p>From our central hub in Bury we operate across a wide geographical location encompassing Bolton, Heywood, Middleton, Rochdale, Bury and North Manchester. The service has developed a reputation for innovation and transformed into a Community Benefits Society working in partnership with patients and a range of other service providers to deliver high quality patient focused care to the heart of its local communities.</p>
title: Non-Executive Director of Governance/Strategy Workforce
